author: Sarah Mayer
text: Just 6 more postcards to write out of the 100 total I’ve got for @piper4missouri Jessica Piper! Glad I can help her out. Democracy is not a spectator sport. If you care, like I do, find a way that you can engage and participate!!

author: Sarah Mayer

author: Sarah Mayer
text:
Take up airspace. Make your voice heard. Take action for things you believe in. Democracy is not a spectator sport. Lessons learned from @HC_Richardson and her amazing #LettersFromAnAmerican
